attributes.action: Improve & Update The .22 #3 Cadet Training Rifle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are the only weapons cadets can regularly train on out-dated Lee Enfields from the Period of the Zulu Wars, When if we do join the armed forces we are going to come into contact with lighter more modern weapons of which we would have no training on at all. So We need to train on the weapons we would actually use in Theatre in the armed Forces
